name: DynamicWater
shortDescription: Easily create a realistic liquid surface simulation.
description: - Fully customizable: by adjusting the liquid properties (tension, damping, spreading), you can simulate different types of
liquids such as: water, jelly, lava, etc.
- Can obtain the height of the surface at any point
- Allows you to have full control over visual properties such as: color opacity, effects, etc.
- Can create a force at any point on the surface.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: The Float In Liquid behavior gives a platformer character object the ability to float realistically in an area of dynamic liquid. It is particularly useful for creating aquatic environments in platform games.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: FloatObject_Platformer

eventsBasedObjects.description: The DynamicSurfaceLiquid prefab object provides a realistic simulation of a liquid surface in your game. It can be used to represent bodies of water, pools, lakes or any other liquid environment.
eventsBasedObjects.name: DynamicLiquidArea

events.comment:
Children instances must be resized when the button size change:
- background is resized to take the full dimensions of the button
- the DrawWaterBody size is refreshed according to the value

The scale is set back to 1 because it means that the parent instance has the same dimensions as the union of its children instances.

eventsFunctions.description: Test the collision between the object and the fluid surface.
eventsFunctions.name: CheckSurfaceCollisions

eventsFunctions.description: Checks if the object is inside the liquid area.
eventsFunctions.name: CheckCollision

parameters.description: The object with which it collides
parameters.name: ObjectToCheck

eventsFunctions.description: Apply a force when an object collides with its surface.
eventsFunctions.name: AddForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Add to the surface of _PARAM0_ a force of _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: Float on a dynamic liquid area object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Floating in a dynamic liquid area
eventsFunctions.name: Float
eventsFunctions.sentence: Float _PARAM3_ inside _PARAM0_ to the depth of _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: the tension of the object. The water spring constant. Grater values will pull the water with greater force.
eventsFunctions.name: Tension

eventsFunctions.description: the dampening of the object. The Damping value. Controls how fast the springs will return to their original position.
eventsFunctions.name: Dampening

eventsFunctions.description: the spread of the object. The Spread value will dictacte how much a wave oscilliation wil pass onto their neighboors. BEWARE, super high values may make the water oscilliate forever.
eventsFunctions.name: Spread

eventsFunctions.description: the columns of the object. The number of columns (springs) extended on the water surface.
eventsFunctions.name: Columns

eventsFunctions.description: the thickness of the object. Thickness of the surface collision.
eventsFunctions.name: Thickness

eventsFunctions.description: the surface color of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SurfaceColor

eventsFunctions.description: the surface opacity of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SufaceOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: the bodyColor of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: BodyColor

eventsFunctions.description: the body opacity of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: BodyOpacity

eventsFunctions.description: the surfaceSize of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: SurfaceSize

eventsFunctions.description: the wave period. between 0 and 1 of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: WavePeriod

eventsFunctions.description: the wave magnitude, in pixels of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: WaveMagnitude

eventsFunctions.description: the wave length, the smaller the value, the longer the wave of the object.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Wave length, the smaller the value, the longer the wave
eventsFunctions.name: WaveLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: the wave length, the smaller the value, the longer the wave

eventsFunctions.description: the waveDirection of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: WaveDirection

eventsFunctions.description: Check if auto waves.
eventsFunctions.name: AutoWave

eventsFunctions.description: Change if auto waves .
eventsFunctions.name: SetAutoWave

eventsFunctions.description: the colorOfColumns of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ColorOfColumns

eventsFunctions.description: Check if show the spring columns.
eventsFunctions.name: ShowColumns

eventsFunctions.description: Change if show the spring columns.
eventsFunctions.name: SetShowColumns
